Licensing

GoAhead is licensed under an evaluation and a commercial license. You may use either, provide you fully comply with the governing terms.

  • Embedthis Evaluation License.
  • GoAhead Commercial License.

GoAhead Commercial License

The GoAhead commercial license is a royalty-free license that provides you with the following benefits:

  • The right to develop and modify the software to embed in your products
  • The ability to redistribute your products with the software
  • The ability to keep your source code private
  • Simple royalty-free, one-time purchase options
  • Software maintenance for updates, upgrades and security patches
  • Priority software support services

If you require a commercial license or commercial support for GoAhead, please contact us at: licensing@embedthis.com.

Embedthis Evaluation License

GoAhead my be used with the Evaluation License. This is ideal for evaluating GoAhead and for internal use.

If you are evaluating GoAhead internally, and not distributing any products containing GoAhead, then you may be able to use the Evaluation license for this purpose. Once complete, you may purchase a commercial license so that you can distribute your product. You may evaluate, develop, modify, and embed GoAhead in your application or product provided it is not distributed.

Please contact licensing@embedthis.com if you have any questions about licensing GoAhead.
